mapper.insert: insert into HEAVY_METAL_MI (ID, SEC_ID, MONITOR_TIME, ORGANIC, ORGANIC_SY, CADMIUM, CADMIUM_SY, MERCURY, MERCURY_SY, ARSENIC, ARSENIC_SY, COPPER, COPPER_SY, LEAD, LEAD_SY, CHROMIUM, CHROMIUM_SY, ZINC, ZINC_SY, NICKEL, NICKEL_SY, MON_UNIT, MONITOR, INPUTER, AUDITOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{organic,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{organicSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cadmium,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cadmiumSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mercury,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mercurySy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arsenic,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{arsenicSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{copper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{copperSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lead,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{leadSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chromium,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{chromiumSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zinc,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{zincSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nickelSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update HEAVY_METAL_MI set SEC_ID = #{secId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR_TIME = #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORGANIC = #{organic,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ORGANIC_SY = #{organicSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CADMIUM = #{cadmium,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CADMIUM_SY = #{cadmiumSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCURY = #{mercury,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, MERCURY_SY = #{mercurySy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARSENIC = #{arsenic,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ARSENIC_SY = #{arsenicSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COPPER = #{copper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, COPPER_SY = #{copperSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAD = #{lead,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LEAD_SY = #{leadSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHROMIUM = #{chromium,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CHROMIUM_SY = #{chromiumSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZINC = #{zinc,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ZINC_SY = #{zincSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICKEL = #{nickel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, NICKEL_SY = #{nickelSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MON_UNIT = #{monUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR = #{monitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUTER = #{inputer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SEC_ID, MONITOR_TIME, ORGANIC, ORGANIC_SY, CADMIUM, CADMIUM_SY, MERCURY, MERCURY_SY, ARSENIC, ARSENIC_SY, COPPER, COPPER_SY, LEAD, LEAD_SY, CHROMIUM, CHROMIUM_SY, ZINC, ZINC_SY, NICKEL, NICKEL_SY, MON_UNIT, MONITOR, INPUTER, AUDITOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from HEAVY_METAL_MI where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
